text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The candidate answer explicitly addresses condominium risks under section 1 ('Condominium status (if applicable)') by advising the user to request the *verbali* (meeting minutes) of the last two *assemblee condominiali* (condominium assemblies) and the *regolamento condominiale* (condominium regulations). It also lists 'Undisclosed condominium debts' as a pitfall in section 5, advising to request a *certificato di saldo* (balance certificate) from the administrator. This directly covers debts, meeting minutes, and implicitly covers extraordinary works via the need to check assembly minutes and reserve funds.", "criterion_id": "a1f245aa-4d10-4f38-93ec-24942e064301"}
